data.title: Best Places to Work in Sports: Team/League/Governing Body — Orlando Magic
data.meta_description: Best Places to Work in Sports: Team/League/Governing Body. Silver Medalist: Orlando Magic.
data.text:
Team/League/Governing Body: 50 or More Employees

Orlando Magic (Silver)

Employees: 783

Headquarters: Orlando

Primary business: NBA team

Key executive: Alex Martins, CEO

Top Engagement Category: Team Dynamics

What makes it a Best Place to Work:

■ This organization truly cares about the well-being of its employees and provides tremendous support across the board. I am extremely grateful for the flexibility and trust our leadership provides to each and every person.

■ The Orlando Magic as an organization is everything you dream of when thinking of a place you want to work. From the staff to the culture and everything in between, I feel lucky to work at a place like the Orlando Magic.

■ We live our organization’s core values of community, innovation, be legendary and teamwork. The people who work here care about and support each other and are working toward common goals.
